DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate safety medicine COPD ( Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease ) . This study last 56 week , subject visit clinic 16 time . Subjects give breathe test , record breathing symptom daily diary card .
DOC.brief_title: GW815SF For Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease ( Chronic Bronchitis , Emphysema )
DOC.mesh_term: Fluticasone Propionate , Salmeterol Xinafoate Drug Combination
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Diagnosis COPD . Exclusion criterion : Diagnosis asthma uncontrolled medical condition respiratory disorder COPD . Other inclusion exclusion criterion evaluate first study visit .
